column4: just jumped ship from Win7 and im having some wifi issues. Anyone able to gimme some advice?
ask a specific question or no one will help i'm afraid :)
my wireless card says it finds my router and connects, but i cant do anything ::p
do you have a proxy/parental controls on your router?
i do not believe so
yesterday someone here said it could have something to do with wpa vs wep but i had to run to work
everytime i try to make the jump to ubuntu i always have wifi issues
go to terminal, and type "ping www.google.com"
i can ping right now because im on my phones internet :P
can you ping when you're connected to the wifi?
nope
i cant even ping internally
are you using the free or nonfree drivers?
im just using what installed when i loaded 10.04
i'm afraid I don't know
thats probably my next step. figuring out HOW to install drivers in linux :P im still nervous about linux. i was so comfortable in windows :P
have you heard of ndiswrapper?
yes. a few years back i had to mess around with it
try it
try ndis-gtk
*ndisgtk
ok i installed it ndistk now what?
google your wifi card name and "windows driver"
i have my drivers as an .exe now what?
